extends Object

Method Detail

setURL

public void setURL(URL url)
Set the URL to be used in other methods of this object.

Parameters:
url - java.net.URL object of the URL to request from

getURL

public URL getURL()
Set the URL that is set to be used in other methods of this object.

Returns:
java.net.URL object of the URL to request from

setTrustAllCerts

public void setTrustAllCerts(boolean trust)
Set this object to trust all Certificate Authorties when connecting via the https protocol. Setting to true causes this object to use a Nulled Trust Manager. Default is false, and uses a normal Trust Manager.

Parameters:
trust - set to true to trust all ssl certs, default is false

getTrustAllCerts

public boolean getTrustAllCerts()
Get the setting of this object using a Nulled Trust Manager. Will be true if the object is set to use a Nulled Trust Manager.

Returns:
true if object is set to trust all ssl certs, default is false

isSSL

public boolean isSSL()
If the URL is set, and the protocol is https, this method returns true. Otherwise this method returns false. If the URL has not been set yet, via setURL, then this method returns false. Simply, this method returns true only if getURL().getProtocol.equals("https")

Returns:
true if the HTTP connection will use SSL

setTrustManager

public void setTrustManager(TrustManager tm)
Set the TrustManager. Setting the Trust Manager will override the object creating its own Trust Manager. If the object has been set true for setTrustAllCerts(boolean), and the Trust Manager has been set with this method. This object will use this Trust Manager, and not create its own Nulled Trust Manager.

Parameters:
tm - javax.net.ssl.TrustManager object of the URL to request from

getTrustManager

public TrustManager getTrustManager()
Get the TrustManager

Returns:
javax.net.ssl.TrustManager object of the URL to request from

urlRequest

public String urlRequest(String httpUrl)
                  throws GeneralSecurityException,
                         MalformedURLException,
                         IOException
Perform an HTTP request and return the results

Parameters:
httpUrl - a String representing a URL to retrieve HTTP results from
Returns:
String The results of the HTTPS request
Throws:
GeneralSecurityException - if an error occurs configuring the Null Trust Manager in the SSL context
MalformedURLException
IOException - if connecting to the URL fails

urlRequest

public String urlRequest(String httpUrl,
                         boolean trustallcerts)
                  throws GeneralSecurityException,
                         MalformedURLException,
                         IOException
Perform an HTTP request and return the results

Parameters:
httpUrl - a String representing a URL to retrieve HTTP results from
trustallcerts - set to true to not verify the trust of SSL Certificates
Returns:
String The results of the HTTPS request
Throws:
GeneralSecurityException - if an error occurs configuring the Null Trust Manager in the SSL context
MalformedURLException
IOException - if connecting to the URL fails
